channel.title: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
channel.description: A Damn Good Movie talk show hosted by Dwayne Smith, Al Valentine, Glen Beltran and Felicia Rivera. Topical, informative, and always fun. Check it out!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Yeah, that's right. Another damn podcast about movies.
channel.itunes:author: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
channel.itunes:summary: A Damn Good Movie talk show hosted by Dwayne Smith, Al Valentine, Glen Beltran and Felicia Rivera. Topical, informative, and always fun. Check it out!

item.title: EPISODE 65: REPEAT OF EPISODE 51: TIME TRAVEL
item.description: This week we discuss our favorite TIME TRAVEL MOVIES. Also we included a special preview of our new podcast SCIENCE WITH AL. NEXT WEEK WE ARE BACK WITH ALL NEW EPISODES.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary:
This week we discuss our favorite TIME TRAVEL MOVIES. Also we included a special preview of our new podcast SCIENCE WITH AL.
NEXT WEEK WE ARE BACK WITH ALL NEW EPISODES.

item.title: EPISODE 64: REPEAT OF EPISODE 21 BLAXPLOITATION MOVIES
item.description: This week we discuss the new movie X-MEN FIRST CLASS. Also we talk get it on with BLAXPLOITATION MOVIES. In the news a release date for George Lucas produced RED TAILS, a Jackie Robinson Bio-pic, a James Brown bio-pic coming from Spike Lee, Elvis Mitchell fired, and Halle Berry remaking Foxy Brown. And of course much, much more.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss the new movie X-MEN FIRST CLASS. Also we talk get it on with BLAXPLOITATION MOVIES. In the news a release date for George Lucas produced RED TAILS, a Jackie Robinson Bio-pic, a James Brown bio-pic coming from Spike Lee, Elvis Mitchell fired, and Halle Berry remaking Foxy Brown. And of course much, much more.

item.title: EPISODE 63: REPEAT OF EPISODE 28 INTERVIEW WITH RUPERT WYATT
item.description: In this episode we interview Rupert Wyatt director of Rise of the Planet of the Apes. We also talk about animation.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: In this episode we interview Rupert Wyatt director of Rise of the Planet of the Apes. We also talk about animation.

item.title: EPISODE 62: Repeat of Episode 33 Film Composers
item.description: This is a re-broadcast of one of our most popular episodes. We talk about movie music and composers. This is an episode filled with great music. Check it out.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This is a re-broadcast of one of our most popular episodes. We talk about movie music and composers. This is an episode filled with great music. Check it out.

item.title: EPISODE 61: REPEAT OF EPISODE 40 MOVIE REMAKES
item.description: Discussion of movie remakes. Damien Bagely is guest on show. Review of the movie The Thing.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: Discussion of movie remakes. Damien Bagely is guest on show. Review of the movie The Thing.

item.title: EPISODE 60: UPCOMING MOVIES FOR 2012
item.description: We discuss the upcoming movies for 2012 including AVENGERS, DARK KNIGHT RISES, SNOW WHITE AND THE HUNTSMEN, DJANGO UNCHAINED, ALEX CROSS, FRANKENWEENIE, and ABRAHAM LINCOLN VAMPIRE HUNTER. Also we review the new movie Project X.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: We discuss the upcoming movies for 2012 including AVENGERS, DARK KNIGHT RISES, SNOW WHITE AND THE HUNTSMEN, DJANGO UNCHAINED, ALEX CROSS, FRANKENWEENIE, and ABRAHAM LINCOLN VAMPIRE HUNTER. Also we review the new movie Project X.

item.title: EPISODE 59: THE OSCARS
item.description: This week we discuss the Oscars. In the news Ridley Scott talks about Prometheus, Dwayne Johnson does Hercules, John McClane gets a son, Johnny Depp does The Night Stalker, and Adam Sandler holds the record for the most Razzies. We also review the new movie Act of Valor.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss the Oscars. In the news Ridley Scott talks about Prometheus, Dwayne Johnson does Hercules, John McClane gets a son, Johnny Depp does The Night Stalker, and Adam Sandler holds the record for the most Razzies. We also review the new movie Act of Valor.

item.title: EPISODE 58: GHOST RIDER, THIS MEANS WAR, & ESSENTIAL FILMS
item.description: This week we review the two new releases, GHOST RIDER and THIS MEANS WAR. The show's topic is essential movies for true movie buffs. In the news Zorro goes into the future, Oprah makes a movie about a butler, a sequel in the works for Tin Tin, and Warner's looks to profit off of Witney Houston's death.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we review the two new releases, GHOST RIDER and THIS MEANS WAR. The show's topic is essential movies for true movie buffs. In the news Zorro goes into the future, Oprah makes a movie about a butler, a sequel in the works for Tin Tin, and Warner's looks to profit off of Witney Houston's death.

item.title: EPISODE 57: SAFE HOUSE, WOMAN IN BLACK, & HOLLYWOOD FAMILIES
item.description: We review SAFE HOUSE & WOMAN IN BLACK. We discuss great Hollywood families. In the news Whitney Houston's death, a reboot of Space 1999, and why does the new Lone Ranger movie cost 215 million?
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: We review SAFE HOUSE & WOMAN IN BLACK. We discuss great Hollywood families. In the news Whitney Houston's death, a reboot of Space 1999, and why does the new Lone Ranger movie cost 215 million?

item.title: EPISODE 56: CHRONICLE, BIG MIRACLE, AND CLICHES
item.description: This week we discuss movie cliches. We also review the movies CHRONICLE and BIG MIRACLE. In the news a Back to the Future Broadway Musical, Russell Crowe might be RobCop, a movie based on Stretch Armstrong, a Adam Sandler project based on the game Candy Land, and a planned remake of Death Wish.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss movie cliches. We also review the movies CHRONICLE and BIG MIRACLE. In the news a Back to the Future Broadway Musical, Russell Crowe might be RobCop, a movie based on Stretch Armstrong, a Adam Sandler project based on the game Candy Land, and a planned remake of Death Wish.

item.title: EPISODE 55: THE ARTIST, THE GREY, & MAN ON A LEDGE
item.description: This week we discuss the new movies THE ARTIST, THE GREY, and MAN ON A LEDGE. We also discuss the movies we'd take with us on a desert island. In the news Demi Moore leaves, Lovelace, James Franco plays Hef, and The Hangover stars demand 15 million each. DESERT ISLAND 2:00 ​ NEWS 56:00 ​ MOVIE REVIEWS 1:14:00 ​ MOVIE GAME 1:38:35
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW

item.title: EPISODE 54: RED TAILS, UNDERWORD, & VAMPIRES
item.description: This week we discuss the new movies, RED TAILS & UNDERWORLD. We also talk about our favorite Vampire movies. In the news George Lucas talks retirement, and James Franco puts another notch in his belt. Plus the movie trivia game.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss the new movies, RED TAILS & UNDERWORLD. We also talk about our favorite Vampire movies. In the news George Lucas talks retirement, and James Franco puts another notch in his belt. Plus the movie trivia game.

item.title: EPISODE 53: OUR ONE YEAR ANNIVERSARY YEAH!
item.description: This week we discuss our one week anniversary. The past, present, and future of the DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW. We also discuss the new movie CONTRABAND. In the news George Lucas had to fight to get Red Tails released, George Takei Facebook postings, Lionsgate buys Summit Entertainment, and a remake of Police Academy.
item.dc:creator: DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW
item.itunes:summary: This week we discuss our one week anniversary. The past, present, and future of the DAMN GOOD MOVIE SHOW. We also discuss the new movie CONTRABAND. In the news George Lucas had to fight to get Red Tails released, George Takei Facebook postings, Lionsgate buys Summit Entertainment, and a remake of Police Academy.

item.title: EPISODE 52: TINKER, ZOO, & WORST BEST PICTURES
item.description: This week we discuss the WORST BEST PICTURE WINNERS AT THE OSCARS. Also we discuss the new movies TINKER TAILOR SOLDIER SPY and WE BOUGHT A ZOO. In the news James Franco lands a new role, Kristin Wiig does not want to do Bridesmaids 2, and a man strips at a Chipmunks screening. WORST/BEST MOVIES 3:00 NEWS 50:15 MOVIE REVIEWS 1:13:35 MOVIE GAME 1:20:25

item.title: EPISODE 51: TIME TRAVEL AND SCIENCE WITH AL
item.description: This week we discuss our favorite TIME TRAVEL MOVIES. Also we included a holiday special preview of our new podcast SCIENCE WITH AL.
